text: The following is a list of the 153 communes of the Var département, in France. (CAT) Agglomeration community of Toulon Provence Mediterranean, created in 2002. (CAF) Agglomeration community of Fréjus-Saint-Raphaël, created in 2000. (CAD) Agglomeration community of Dracénoise, created in 2001. (CAG) Agglomeration community of Garlaban Huveaune Sainte-Baume, created in 2000, most of which is located in the Bouches-du-Rhône département. (CCC) Commune community of Cœur du Var - Plaine des Maures, created in 2002.
